parameters.name: ChamferType
parameters.description: Chamfer type as defined by swChamferType_e

parameters.name: Width
parameters.description: If ChamferType is swChamferAngleDistance, then specify width of chamfer

parameters.name: Angle
parameters.description: If ChamferType is swChamferAngleDistance, then specify the angle of the chamfer

parameters.name: OtherDist
parameters.description: If ChamferType is swChamferEqualDistance, then you can specify a single value so that all distances are equal

parameters.name: VertexChamDist1
parameters.description: If ChamferType is swChamferDistanceDistance or swChamferVertex, then specify a value for the distance on first side

parameters.name: VertexChamDist2
parameters.description: If ChamferType is swChamferDistanceDistance or swChamferVertex, then specify a value for the distance on second side

parameters.name: VertexChamDist3
parameters.description: If ChamferType is swChamferVertex, then specify a value for the distance on third side

title: IFeatureManager.InsertFeatureChamfer
signature:
Feature InsertFeatureChamfer( 
   System.Int32
Options
,
   System.Int32
ChamferType
,
   System.Double
Width
,
   System.Double
Angle
,
   System.Double
OtherDist
,
   System.Double
VertexChamDist1
,
   System.Double
VertexChamDist2
,
   System.Double
VertexChamDist3
)

parameters.name: ChamferType
parameters.description: Chamfer type as defined by swChamferType_e

parameters.name: Width
parameters.description: If ChamferType is swChamferAngleDistance, then specify width of chamfer

parameters.name: Angle
parameters.description: If ChamferType is swChamferAngleDistance, then specify the angle of the chamfer

parameters.name: OtherDist
parameters.description: If ChamferType is swChamferEqualDistance, then you can specify a single value so that all distances are equal

parameters.name: VertexChamDist1
parameters.description: If ChamferType is swChamferDistanceDistance or swChamferVertex, then specify a value for the distance on first side

parameters.name: VertexChamDist2
parameters.description: If ChamferType is swChamferDistanceDistance or swChamferVertex, then specify a value for the distance on second side

parameters.name: VertexChamDist3
parameters.description: If ChamferType is swChamferVertex, then specify a value for the distance on third side

remarks:
Both swChamferType_e.swChamferAngleDistance and swChamferType_e.swChamferDistanceDistance are edge chamfers. This means that all measurements are from edges. An angle-distance chamfer requires an angle and a distance; a distance-distance chamfer requires two distances, one for each side of the chamfered edge.
A swChamferType_e.swChamferVertex chamfer only works on a vertex with three adjacent edges of the same convexity. A vertex chamfer requires three distances along three adjacent edges. For non-linear edges, this value is an arc length value; it is not a chordal value. See
IVertex::EnumEdgesOriented
to determine the edge order used by this method.
